column4: ive been stuck without x since i switched to dapper, now i used debxconf to reconfigure xorg and it launched, the problem now is that ive been relying on FGLRXCONFIG to get the settings i wanted with no hassle, no it doesnt seem to produce a working xorg.conf for me
